title.zh: 南昌：西南区域血友病学术前沿交流会
title.en: Nanchang: Southwest Regional Hemophilia Academic Frontier Exchange Conference

description.zh: 西南区域血友病学术前沿交流会暨血友病组织创新实践赋能交流会由南昌市血之友公益协会主办。血友姐妹会负责人左钰洁以《女性血友病携带者为何也会患血友病？解密基因表达》为题作分享。南昌血之友公益协会延续「携带者检测援助」项目，帮助18名女性做凝血检测。这次会议展示了南昌在血友病学术研究和组织创新方面的成果。
description.en: The Southwest Regional Hemophilia Academic Frontier Exchange Conference and Hemophilia Organization Innovation Practice Empowerment Exchange Conference was hosted by Nanchang Hemophilia Association. Yujie (Ruby) Zuo, leader of the Hemophilia Sisters team, gave a presentation titled 'Why Do Female Hemophilia Carriers Also Develop Hemophilia? Decoding Gene Expression'. Nanchang Hemophilia Association continued the 'Carrier Testing Assistance' project, helping 18 women with coagulation testing. This conference showcased Nanchang's achievements in hemophilia academic research and organizational innovation.

title.zh: 微信公众号：学术交流会报道
